# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a set of JSON formatting options from an integer that represents those options.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: An option set of writing options defined by this type.
title: init(rawValue:)
